string.text: Important Cargo: Find the Container
Find the container dropped from the helicopter.
Important Cargo: Deliver the Container to Kolyazin
Deliver the container safely and intact to Kolyazin.
Sabotage: Search the First Courtyard
Search the first courtyard along the route of the wounded soldier. Find the explosives he dropped.
Sabotage: Search the Next Courtyard
Search the next courtyard along the route of the wounded soldier. Find the explosives he dropped.
Sabotage: Plant the Explosives in the APC
Plant the explosives in the APC without being noticed.
Sabotage: Return to the Military Camp
Return to the military camp and report to Kolyazin about the mission's success.
Assault: Attack the Spectrum group
Attack the Spectrum group
Assault: Shoot down the evacuation helicopter
Shoot down the Spectrum evacuation helicopter
Assault: Shoot down the combat helicopter
Shoot down the Spectrum combat helicopter
Assault: Storm the House of Culture
Storm the House of Culture building
Assault: Clear the second floor
Clear the second floor
Assault: Check the basement
Check the basement
Despair: Talk to an unknown person
Talk to an unknown person
Despair: Talk to Kolyazin
Talk to Kolyazin
Despair: Escape from the military
Escape from the military
